title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embeddings in LangChain applications.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama supporting chat, models management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for integrating Ollama into Ruby and Rails applications.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings and chat with a local vector DB.

title: ollama-np
summary: Official .NET/C# client for Ollama with async I/O and streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and docker-compose examples for CPU and GPU (CUDA, ROCm) deployments.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) client for Ollama written in Go with conversation threading and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that adds Ollama chat and code-generation commands to the editor.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama with GenServer behavior for easy integration into Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models directly in Slack channels.
